description.value: The effects of the smoke created by an alchemist’s bomb duplicates the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.hv1vqeuh5eji28rz]{Contagion, Greater} instead of @Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{Fog Cloud}, filling an area equal to twice the bomb’s splash radius for 1 round per level. An alchemist must be at least 16th level and must possess the plague bomb and smoke bomb discoveries before selecting this discovery.
